fullText: This splendid musical is pure joy from start to finish, with Robert Fairchild and Leanne Cope dancing their way into your heart with grace and athletic artistry.
dtliExcerpt: This splendid musical is pure joy from start to finish, with Robert Fairchild and Leanne Cope dancing their way into your heart with grace and athletic artistry.
bwwExcerpt: But the reason this beautiful ballet-happy show is so richly satisfying isn't luck. It's about director and choreographer Christopher Wheeldon of London's Royal Ballet. Guiding his first musical, Wheeldon shows a vibrant vision and buckets of imagination, transforming the 1951 Gene Kelly-Leslie Caron film that inspires the show. He's also got a cast and design team at the top of their game.
